name: PICO-8 / Game 1
description:
Game made with PICO-8 for a weekly school assignment. Expect some more... If I've got the time :P

How to play

Use the arrow keys to move around and collect them coins. Avoid the rats, they eat your heart. And that's pretty much it.

Changes to original file:
  • Animation for the player
  • A more satisfying keyboard input movement
  • Added a coin sprite and an extra animation for it
  • 2 Sound FXs when collecting coin or hitting enemy
